Package mvc.controller

Class GraphicsStockController

  • java.lang.Object
    • mvc.controller.GraphicsStockController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener, StockController
    public class GraphicsStockController
extends java.lang.Object
implements StockController, java.awt.event.ActionListener
    The GraphicsStockController class is an implementation on the StockController interface that works for graphical user interfaces.
